desc: LEARN TO FREEDIVE in Nelson Bay and internationally with Salty Pilgrims Freediving! Molchanovs & PADI Certified Beginner, Intermediate and Advanced Freediving Courses. Spearfishing Courses, Fiji Spearfishing, Surfing and Freediving Trips, Whitsundays and Great Barrier Reef Sailing, Freediving and Spearfishing Retreats.

layout.text: Freedive, Spearfish and Surf in Fiji
Crystal clear water, beautiful coral reefs, abundant fish life, perfect uncrowded waves, friendly locals, beachfront accommodation...
